name: Monster University - Michael Wazowski also known as Mike 😍.
description:
Michael Wazowski also known as Mike 😍.


He is a short, lime green spherical monster with one large green eye, two small horns on his head, and thin arms and legs attached to either side of his torso.

-------------------------------------------------------

🎨 More than 4500+ vector layers

🧩No plugin used

😈Body Skin texture was complicated to create

⬇️ Download from Figma community

-------------------------------------------------------

Mike is a very giving person, and is always willing to help his friends if they need him. He is proud and confident, and he is as devoted to his work as he is to Sulley. Mike is outgoing and funny, despite his serious outlook on training Sulley to be the best Scarer.

#figma #illustration
